meanings: (말하다) say, (큰 소리로) call out, (받아 적도록) dictate

phrases.phrase: 비지에 부른 배가 연약과도 싫다 한다
meanings: (속담) A full stomach is not interested in delicacies. or Provide enough bread and no one will ask for cake.
greed has no limits, count your blessings
